channel.title: Huawei on Documentation for Admost API Services
channel.description: Recent content in Huawei on Documentation for Admost API Services

item.title: Get app id and app secret
item.description: Getting your app’s app id and app secret from huawei developer console App id and app secret allow Admost to connect with Huawei on your behalf. Log in to Huawei Developer Consol Navigate to “App Services” and click AppGalery Connect Click My Apps and select your app In App Information, you can see App ID and App Secret
